meanings.definition: Having the most knobs or protuberances.
meanings.sent1: The knobbliest tree in the forest had so many bumps on its trunk.
meanings.sent2: The rock with the knobbliest surface was difficult to climb.
meanings.sent3: The knobbliest potato in the bag looked like a tiny mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her knobbliest necklace was a tangled mess of beads and charms.
meanings.sent5: The knobbliest path through the woods was a challenging hike.

meanings.sent1: The knobbliest chair in the room was also the most uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: His knobbliest fingers were perfect for playing the piano with precision.
meanings.sent3: The knobbliest pencil on her desk kept rolling away.
meanings.sent4: The knobbliest road in town was a bumpy ride for cyclists.
meanings.sent5: The knobbliest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
